  "title": "Youtuber / Content Creator",
  "description": "FeclesHost is a registered Web Hosting and Domain Registration Company in Nigeria, empowering digital success for businesses and individuals through innovative, reliable, and affordable online infrastructure. Founded on June 21, 2024, FeclesHost has rapidly grown to become one of the most trusted names in Africa&rsquo;s hosting industry. We are committed to delivering excellence through cutting-edge technology, unmatched uptime, and world-class customer support. At FeclesHost, our mission is to make web hosting simple, secure, and scalable &mdash; helping entrepreneurs, developers, and enterprises bring their ideas to life on the internet. We are renowned for our responsive customer support, transparent pricing, and customer-first approach, ensuring every client receives real value and confidence in their digital journey.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Youtuber / Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Volunteer

Description


	At FeclesHost, we believe that great companies are built by great people who are passionate, creative, driven, and ready to grow.
	As we continue expanding our digital footprint and pushing new boundaries in hosting, cloud solutions, and user-focused innovation, we are opening our doors to talented individuals who want to be part of something meaningful.


Responsibilities


	Produces explainer videos, tutorials, and announcements. (Improves visibility and trust through visual storytelling.)


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and work experience.


Why You Should Join Us (Even as a Volunteer)


	FeclesHost is still growing, evolving, and building.
	Every step we take opens new opportunities, and every person who joins us becomes part of the foundation of something bigger.
	By joining our team now:
	
		You grow as the company grows every contribution you make becomes part of our long-term story.
		You gain hands-on experience in a high-impact environment where your ideas matter.
		You work closely with a supportive team that believes in collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning.
		You build a solid portfolio working on real projects that shape real customer experiences.
		You gain visibility and potential transition into paid roles as expansion continues.
	
	


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV or Portfolio to:&nbsp;career@fecleshost.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	This Is a voluntary position with opportunities to transition into a paid role.
	For more enquiry contact the recruiter on: +2348138901857 or&nbsp;info@fecleshost.com.ng

Youtuber / Content Creator Job at FeclesHost




        
    

        
        
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    

FeclesHost is a registered Web Hosting and Domain Registration Company in Nigeria, empowering digital success for businesses and individuals through innovative, reliable, and affordable online infrastructure. Founded on June 21, 2024, FeclesHost has rapidly grown to become one of the most trusted names in Africa’s hosting industry. We are committed to delivering excellence through cutting-edge technology, unmatched uptime, and world-class customer support. At FeclesHost, our mission is to make web hosting simple, secure, and scalable — helping entrepreneurs, developers, and enterprises bring their ideas to life on the internet. We are renowned for our responsive customer support, transparent pricing, and customer-first approach, ensuring every client receives real value and confidence in their digital journey.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Youtuber / Content Creator

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Volunteer

Description


	At FeclesHost, we believe that great companies are built by great people who are passionate, creative, driven, and ready to grow.
	As we continue expanding our digital footprint and pushing new boundaries in hosting, cloud solutions, and user-focused innovation, we are opening our doors to talented individuals who want to be part of something meaningful.


Responsibilities


	Produces explainer videos, tutorials, and announcements. (Improves visibility and trust through visual storytelling.)


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and work experience.


Why You Should Join Us (Even as a Volunteer)


	FeclesHost is still growing, evolving, and building.
	Every step we take opens new opportunities, and every person who joins us becomes part of the foundation of something bigger.
	By joining our team now:
	
		You grow as the company grows every contribution you make becomes part of our long-term story.
		You gain hands-on experience in a high-impact environment where your ideas matter.
		You work closely with a supportive team that believes in collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning.
		You build a solid portfolio working on real projects that shape real customer experiences.
		You gain visibility and potential transition into paid roles as expansion continues.
	
	


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV or Portfolio to: career@fecleshost.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	This Is a voluntary position with opportunities to transition into a paid role.
	For more enquiry contact the recruiter on: +2348138901857 or 

        Click here to Apply
